scripts.postinstall: if [ -f backend/package.json ]; then npm --prefix backend install --production --no-audit --no-fund --no-optional --prefer-offline --progress=false; elif [ -f package.json ] && [ -f server.js ]; then npm install --production --no-audit --no-fund --no-optional --prefer-offline --progress=false; else echo 'No backend package.json found in repo root or current dir; skipping backend install'; fi
